The film follows two U.S. Marshals as they investigate the mysterious disappearance of a patient from a mental institution. As they delve deeper into the case, they uncover disturbing truths and face their own inner demons. The movie is known for its intense atmosphere, gripping storyline, and thought-provoking themes.
